aroma.notes: Thin, watery aroma, just a wisp of smell other than steam

acidity.notes: Puckery kind of lemon zing, but weak

body.notes: No real body or mouthfeel. Just watery.

finish.notes: Lemon aftertaste lingers like after you have a piece of sour candy. Not very pleasant.

flavor: Definitely sour. Predominately the puckering lemon zing, then just watery.
notes: Did a long (40sec) but shallow bloom, then did a fairly quick pour. Drained remarkably fast. Thinking the quick pour forced too much water to bypass the grounds.
